amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute inserted a new text expressing the sense of the House with respect to debt forgiveness for Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a complete new text.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Ros-Lehtinen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ros-Lehtinen amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
